title: Cave Locust
description: 2–3’ long, herbivorous, giant crickets that dwell in caverns.
extras: Blend in with stone: May be overlooked or mistaken for statues, due to their stony colouration.	Shriek: If attacked or frightened, shriek to warn others. This may attract wandering monsters (20% chance per round).	Jump: Very skittish. If attacked, usually flee by jumping up to 60’ then flying away. 50% chance of jumping at a random opponent, in which case treat the jump as an attack.	Spit: Used defensively. 10’ range. Target treated as AC 9 [10]. The affected character is covered in stinking spittle: unable to act for 1 turn (save versus poison). Until the goo is washed off, others who come within 5’ must also save versus poison or be violently sick.	Poison immunity: Immune to yellow mould and most poisons, due to their habit of eating fungi.
